content:
From Binghamton/Syracuse, New York

Take Interstate 81 South to the PA Turnpike I-476 South stay on the turnpike to the Pocono Exit 95 – go through toll booth and then get in the left lane at the light make a left onto Rt 940 East. At the first traffic light, turn right on to Moseywood Road, you will see two large stone pillars at the entrance to Split Rock Resort.
